title: Aadhaar Demographic Update
author: Shubham
body:
We have happy to share that we have started Aadhaar Demographic update service
We currently provide the following mentioned service below

Mobile Update / Correction

Email Id Update / Correction

Name Update / Correction

Address Update / Correction

DOB Update / Correction

Aadhaar - AAM ADMI KA ADHIKAR

UIDAI

To avail this service , user / candidate need to take an prior appointment as per Covid guideline, and shall maintain safety regulation at the premises. Note: Kindly provide the Original document as well as prescribed documentation as per provide by UIDAI Guideline.

title: Pan Card Service
author: Sanjay Kumar
body:
We provide Pan service, where user can either apply for new / correction / lost.
we work with major Pan authorised company which is tied up with CSC

UTI

NSDL

BUILDING A GOOD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE DOES NOT HAPPEN BY ACCIDENT. IT HAPPENS BY DESIGN

Anonymous

For applying Pan card, user need to visit the center (If applying in Physical mode) and provide a copy of Aadhaar & two Passport size photos, for correction additional Pan card copy is required with the correcting details.
Do provide the correct details ,if there is any Incorrect data or document is provided. User/Applicant has to bear the charges.
